pageTitle: Blackburn Rovers - Vital Rovers Newcomer of the Season
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {34779=With YOUR help Vital Blackburn has been trying to determine what have been the best and worst of the Blackburn Rovers 2006-2007 season. The nominations are still be taken for other Awards, but the Vital Blackburn Awards for 2006-2007 continue to be dished out with a Special Award suggested by BomBom for the Vital Blackburn Newcomer of the Season When asked to simply leave the name of the Vital Blackburn member you see as being the NEWCOMER of the Season most felt BomBom & MikeyGamst should be the joint Award Winners! So congratulations to BomBom and MikeyGamst! For their constant comments, so many of which have been absolutely hilarious, the large number of articles written and submitted for publishing and the fact that both joined during the season (to become eligible for the "Newcomer" Award) after tying with mentions these guys share, and rightly so, this honour. As I said on the Member of the Season Award, we have ALL more than played our part this season though and have all been newcomers at some point, so we all deserve MASSIVE credit. To see what people had to say on this category click here. Thanks for voting on this, PLEASE KEEP your votes coming in for these other Awards, as there is STILL time to vote so click here for the list of categories and vote on the one(s) you want! NOT REGISTERD TO VITAL BLACKBURN? WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR!
